meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Israeli Party Quits, for Now The linchpin Shas Party quit Prime Minister Ehud Barak's governing coalition, but its resignation does not take effect for 48 hours, leaving ample time for bargaining.
Israeli Party Quits, for Now The linchpin Shas Party quit Prime Minister Ehud Barak's governing coalition, but its resignation does not take effect for 48 hours, leaving ample time for bargaining.
Brazil Bans Firearms Sales In response to public alarm over a rising crime wave, Brazil's government banned the sales of firearms and proposed a package of other security measures.
Disputed Award in Germany The award of a top German literary prize to a historian who has sought to justify the Holocaust has ignited fierce debate at a time of conservative stirrings in Europe.
